Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

note: My name is Gideon. I’m a 14 year old boy who likes dogs. These are pictures of dogs I have pet. Account supervised by mom.

Now, now, sir. Please try to remain calm. Your fear of—what do you call it? “Grooming?” Yes, you’ve become very upset about a belief you have in this “grooming,” I see here in your chart. Well, you’ll be pleased to know that the staff here have looked into your concerns and it turns out that it’s all 🐘💩 designed to trigger your amygdala and provoke a panic response. The very best way, sir, for you to recover, is to have some damn empathy for your fellow human beings and treat them with respect.
